data.name: Dream Hacker
data.detailed_description:

About the Game



‚óÜStory


I, Naoto Miyaguchi, a single, straight, neet hacker in my late twenties, had invented an amazing machine, the Dream Machine.
Although it looked worn out like an antique piece of junk in a junkyard, it could receive dream signals and process them to restore the details of the dream worlds, enabling me to observe the dreams of others!



If that was all it could do, that wouldn‚Äôt be much use of it. The point was that by deciphering the dream key, it could create an interference signal that affected the dream world, allowing me to interact with the dream world and to actually enter it.



So at the age of 29 but still a virgin, I didn't hesitate to go on this quest to find a beautiful girls‚Äô dreams...
A series of amorous adventures began there.

‚óÜGame Features


‚óá5 main female characters with different temperaments
‚óá11 live 2D animated CGs that can be controlled freely, including a variety of sex plays, giving you a variety of experiences
‚óáUnique typing match 3 game with 16 special word attributes
‚óáCreative fan workshops is open for downloading and uploading vocabulary
data.about_the_game:
‚óÜStory


I, Naoto Miyaguchi, a single, straight, neet hacker in my late twenties, had invented an amazing machine, the Dream Machine.
Although it looked worn out like an antique piece of junk in a junkyard, it could receive dream signals and process them to restore the details of the dream worlds, enabling me to observe the dreams of others!



If that was all it could do, that wouldn‚Äôt be much use of it. The point was that by deciphering the dream key, it could create an interference signal that affected the dream world, allowing me to interact with the dream world and to actually enter it.



So at the age of 29 but still a virgin, I didn't hesitate to go on this quest to find a beautiful girls‚Äô dreams...
A series of amorous adventures began there.

‚óÜGame Features


‚óá5 main female characters with different temperaments
‚óá11 live 2D animated CGs that can be controlled freely, including a variety of sex plays, giving you a variety of experiences
‚óáUnique typing match 3 game with 16 special word attributes
‚óáCreative fan workshops is open for downloading and uploading vocabulary
data.short_description: With the help of the dream machine, you can invade the dreams of sleeping girls. Here you can do whatever you want, or you can help them by interpreting their dreams and then collecting the ‚Äúreward‚Äù you want.
data.supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, French, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
